titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. collection of 19th century photographs V1986.001
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Weatherly Stephan
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-28T14:19-0500

did.unittitle: Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. collection of 19th century photographs

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains 14 mounted 19th-century photographs, dated 1897 to 1898. Images in the collection show landscapes and rural scenes in Brooklyn, New York City, Long Island, and Westchester County, N.Y. Brooklyn locales include Sheepshead Bay, Coney Island, and Prospect Park; New York Harbor and the Narrows are also included.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids note
otherfindaid.p: Item-level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use note
userestrict.p: Copyright will remain in effect for 120 years following the date of creation. All items in this collection will enter the public domain by 2018. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. collection of 19th century photographs, V1986.001, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
